examples.title: Settings Page with Sidebar Navigation
examples.description: A complete settings page with DocuSignShell, LocalNav sidebar, and form fields organized in cards.

examples.title: Agreement Dashboard with Data Table
examples.description: Full dashboard with DocuSignShell, AgreementTableView, FilterBar, DataTable, and PageHeader showing a typical agreement list view.

examples.title: Simple Form with Validation
examples.description: A focused form page with input validation, error states, and submission — no complex layouts. Good starting template.

examples.title: Detail View with Modal and Tabs
examples.description: A detail page using Card, Tabs for organizing content, and a Modal for confirmation actions.
examples.code:
import { useState } from 'react';
import {
  Stack,
  Card,
  Heading,
  Text,
  Tabs,
  Button,
  Modal,
  Badge,
  Divider,
  Inline,
} from '@/design-system';

export default function AgreementDetail() {
  const [showDeleteModal, setShowDeleteModal] = useState(false);

  const tabItems = [
    {
      id: 'details',
      label: 'Details',
      content: (
        <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-200)">
          <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between">
            <Text variant="secondary">Document Type</Text>
            <Text>Non-Disclosure Agreement</Text>
          </Stack>
          <Divider />
          <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between">
            <Text variant="secondary">Created</Text>
            <Text>January 15, 2024</Text>
          </Stack>
          <Divider />
          <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between">
            <Text variant="secondary">Expires</Text>
            <Text>January 15, 2025</Text>
          </Stack>
        </Stack>
      ),
    },
    {
      id: 'history',
      label: 'History',
      content: (
        <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-200)">
          <Text>Jan 15 — Agreement created by Jane Smith</Text>
          <Text>Jan 15 — Sent to Bob Jones for signature</Text>
          <Text>Jan 16 — Bob Jones signed</Text>
          <Text>Jan 16 — Agreement completed</Text>
        </Stack>
      ),
    },
    {
      id: 'recipients',
      label: 'Recipients',
      content: (
        <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-200)">
          <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between" align="center">
            <Text>Jane Smith (Sender)</Text>
            <Badge kind="success">Signed</Badge>
          </Stack>
          <Divider />
          <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between" align="center">
            <Text>Bob Jones</Text>
            <Badge kind="success">Signed</Badge>
          </Stack>
        </Stack>
      ),
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-300)" style={{ maxWidth: 720, margin: '0 auto', padding: 'var(--ink-spacing-400)' }}>
      <Stack direction="horizontal" justify="space-between" align="center">
        <Stack gap="var(--ink-spacing-50)">
          <Heading level={1}>NDA - Acme Corp</Heading>
          <Inline gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)">
            <Badge kind="success">Completed</Badge>
            <Text variant="secondary" size="sm">Last updated Jan 16, 2024</Text>
          </Inline>
        </Stack>
        <Stack direction="horizontal" gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)">
          <Button kind="secondary">Download</Button>
          <Button kind="danger" onClick={() => setShowDeleteModal(true)}>Delete</Button>
        </Stack>
      </Stack>

      <Card>
        <Tabs items={tabItems} />
      </Card>

      <Modal
        open={showDeleteModal}
        onClose={() => setShowDeleteModal(false)}
        title="Delete Agreement"
        footer={
          <Stack direction="horizontal" gap="var(--ink-spacing-100)" justify="flex-end">
            <Button kind="secondary" onClick={() => setShowDeleteModal(false)}>Cancel</Button>
            <Button kind="danger" onClick={() => setShowDeleteModal(false)}>Delete</Button>
          </Stack>
        }
      >
        <Text>Are you sure you want to delete "NDA - Acme Corp"? This action cannot be undone.</Text>
      </Modal>
    </Stack>
  );
}

examples.title: AI Chat Assistant in Drawer
examples.description: A page layout with a DocuSignShell and an AI chat assistant accessible via a Drawer from the header.
